segments.text: I'll take one . How's the cooler situation ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's still stocked , and there's plenty of ice . Here you are-cheers !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Cheers . You guys didn't drive , did you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , we walked . Why , do you need us to carry some stuff home later ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , it's just that it's a holiday . With everyone out partying , there's a lot of drunk driving .
segments.speaker: S2
